Description:
IN/121021/AGF/FOD3/02 - 312018270
You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare of your employees by failing to take suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, any person falling a distance liable to cause personal injury, namely work on roofs to clean, apply seal coating or any other work activity which may require roof work being undertaken by you, which may cause serious personal injury.
